instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [solved]820-2530 missing ALL_SYS_PWRGD
threads.message:
Have an older MacBook Pro with 820-2530.
The board measures fine as far as I can tell, but I don't get ALL_SYS_PWRGD

On U7870 Pin 3, 5 and 6 all measures the correct voltages but Pin 8 is at 0V

I have some difficulties figuring out how the ALL_SYS_PWRGD circuit works, ca anyone enlighten me?

threads.title: [solved]820-2530 missing ALL_SYS_PWRGD
threads.message: Pin 8 is tied to 3 more  PGOOD outputs. One of them is pulling it low.

threads.title: [solved]820-2530 missing ALL_SYS_PWRGD
threads.message: That's what I was thinking, then I'll just have to figure out how and which one :)

threads.title: [solved]820-2530 missing ALL_SYS_PWRGD
threads.message: Well, it turned out it was U7500 that caused the problem, replaced it now and all good... Thank you for sending me in the right direction Dukefawks
